struct.exostring: This line is displayed if the player left the desert after speaking with Tanis. Tanis dies if the player activates this plot and then leaves the dune sea area. They have presumeably left him to die of thirst.

This is one of four damaged droids surrounding Tanis in the desert. The trick is that the four droids have been damaged, but are using a link between all of them to remain stable. It has, however, immobilised them and trapped Tanis. Player must select each droid and repair it, either through use of the repair skill or by answering riddles If the player fails at a single riddle or skill check, the droid he is working on is destroyed, and Tanis says a one-liner. If the player fails at a second riddle or skill check, all the remaining droids explode, killing Tanis
If the player repairs all the droids (three or four, depending on how many are left) Tanis initiates and then tells teh droids to move away from him, freeing him.

This is a mathematical version of a classic riddle. Each number describes the previous one
4 14(one 4) 11-14(one 1-one 4) etc...
Destroy this single droid. Trigger Tanis to say appropraite overhead line
All droids self destruct Tanis dead
Failed, no other droid riddles have been failed yet
One other droid riddle has been failed
This droid is now "fixed" Set global so that other droids can reference it.
This dialogue line should be recorded. It's Tanis' wife gloating about him being trapped. 1 line in each droid.
Selected after droid riddle solved No its individual riddle, but the whole "save Tanis" thing
Selected after droid riddle solved No its individual riddle, but the whole "save Tanis" thing
Correct with whatever skill is appropriate
Destroy this single droid. Trigger Tanis to say appropraite overhead line
All droids self destruct Tanis dead
Selected after droid riddle solved No its individual riddle, but the whole "save Tanis" thing
